title: First Light
description: The Warmind breach begins. Aegis Corps mobilizes to defend the Skybridge sector.

sections.name: Wake Protocol
sections.description: Tutorial mission. Learn the basics of tactical combat.

dialogue_before.speaker: Commander
dialogue_before.text: RIFT, this is Command. Warmind drones have breached the perimeter. Time to show them what Aegis Corps is made of.

dialogue_before.speaker: RIFT
dialogue_before.text: Copy that, Command. Moving to engage.

dialogue_after.speaker: RIFT
dialogue_after.text: Area clear. Those drones never stood a chance.

dialogue_after.speaker: Commander
dialogue_after.text: Good work. But this is just the beginning. Prepare for deployment to the Skybridge.

sections.name: Streetline Breach
sections.description: Defend the Skybridge against Warmind assault.

dialogue_before.speaker: Commander
dialogue_before.text: RIFT, HAVEN is deploying to your position. Shock Hounds detected â€” fast melee units. Keep your distance.

dialogue_before.speaker: HAVEN
dialogue_before.text: Medical drone online. I'll keep the squad patched up.

dialogue_before.speaker: RIFT
dialogue_before.text: Good to have you with us, HAVEN. Let's move.

dialogue_after.speaker: HAVEN
dialogue_after.text: Civilians are safe. Good teamwork out there.

dialogue_after.speaker: RIFT
dialogue_after.text: The Warminds are getting more aggressive. What are they after?

dialogue_after.speaker: Commander
dialogue_after.text: That's what we need to find out. Stand by for further orders.

sections.name: Generator Hold
sections.description: Defend the generator against waves of attackers.

dialogue_before.speaker: Commander
dialogue_before.text: The power hub is under attack. If it falls, the entire sector goes dark.

dialogue_before.speaker: EMBER
dialogue_before.text: Ember reporting in. I'll handle the heavy armor.

dialogue_before.speaker: RIFT
dialogue_before.text: Welcome to the squad, Ember. Let's hold this position.

dialogue_after.speaker: EMBER
dialogue_after.text: Generator secured. Nothing gets through us.

dialogue_after.speaker: Commander
dialogue_after.text: Excellent work. We've identified Shield Walkers with frontal armor. Flank them or use armor-shredding weapons.
